text:
This Is Us season two poster is teasing some happy and sad moments.

Actress Mandy Moore shared the poster on Twitter writing, “Buckle up. Season 2. September 26th.” If our estimations are good, the upcoming season is about to bring lots of tears, but also some laughs.

Milo Ventimiglia, who plays Jack, recently told E! News: “I always tell people to focus more on the way the man lived than how he died. I think—look, go back and watch the episodes. Don’t just watch them for Jack, watch them for every character and understand, let’s say what the adversity is and the challengers are and how they’re met with bravery.

To be really honest I feel zero pressure on season two. I think we, on the creative end, are approaching it the same way,” he told us. “We’re just excited to be there. We don’t feel any pressure to do anything grand or big, I think it’s just continuing to tell stories of these really, really great people.
title: “This Is Us” Season 2 Poster Brings the Tears – And Laughs!
